channel.title: Client Crash Issue
channel.description:
im using dragonkk's 562/668 Client with PDF's Source and for some reason on the computer im hosting from i can kill npc's and die from them without the client crashing but when im on my other computer i kill a npc or a player and client crashes same thing happens if i die
I really need help with this i dont know if this is just because my java on this computer or if its a client/Source issue
please let me know as much as you can.

item.title: Client Crash Issue
